Raw and personal experiences of the terror, pride, horror, excitement, friendship and loss – told through the eyes of the people who fought it.","popularity":1.848,"poster_path":"/p47bH1vk87oIRIasIhrb8FZo3ua.jpg","release_date":"2020-11-11","title":"Fight to the Finish","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":391483,"original_language":"sv","original_title":"Fyra dagar som skakade Sverige - Midsommarkrisen 1941","overview":"At dawn on June 22, 1941, Germany invaded the Soviet Union. On the same morning, Germany demanded permission from the Swedish government to transport 18,000 German soldiers from Norway to Finland across Sweden by railway. This was a difficult problem for the Swedish government. On one hand remaining friendly with Germany at the height of its power, on the other maintaining a strict neutrality.  The Swedish cabinet meet in Stockholm to decide upon the best reply to the German demands.","popularity":3.816,"poster_path":"/9zK6PiYgdJ7DWi7JobFv7DSCp77.jpg","release_date":"1988-01-03","title":"Fyra dagar som skakade Sverige - Midsommarkrisen 1941","video":false,"vote_average":8.3,"vote_count":3},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/gsulFZUI3dASgmWVeO8b7sBK77U.jpg","genre_ids":[18,36,10752],"id":11029,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Die Gustloff","overview":"Joseph Vilsmaier Two-part TV movie focuses on the tragic events surrounding the sinking of the Wilhelm Gustloff, a German passenger ship, at the end of World War II. On 30 January 1945, Captain Hellmuth Kehding was in charge of the ship, evacuating wounded soldiers and civilians trapped by the Red Army. Soon after leaving the harbor of Danzig, it was hit by three torpedoes from the Soviet submarine and sank in less than an hour.","popularity":8.189,"poster_path":"/b0UUOb2ztUJlQRzWirXS23UEBiG.jpg","release_date":"2008-03-02","title":"M/S Gustloff","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":17},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/6prkTmEEsB3f9hhKBzUePLe27b2.jpg","genre_ids":[18,36],"id":399404,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Darkest Hour","overview":"In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.","popularity":26.94,"poster_path":"/xa6G3aKlysQeVg9wOb0dRcIGlWu.jpg","release_date":"2017-11-22","title":"Darkest Hour","video":false,"vote_average":7.353,"vote_count":4971},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":872257,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Double Solitaire","overview":"The filmmaker's father and uncle, Norm and Stan, are third generation Japanese Americans. They are \"all American\" guys who love bowling, cards and pinball. Placed in the Amache internment camp as children during World War II, they don't think the experience affected them that much. But in the course of navigating the maze of her father's and uncle's pursuits while simultaneously trying to inquire about their past, the filmmaker is able to find connections between their lives now and the history that was left behind.","popularity":0.886,"poster_path":"/rsEiXAzdAvoN4h5pfIywF4URgcX.jpg","release_date":"1998-03-01","title":"Double Solitaire","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/nY7U5Z4usvbtjjiQLf7JuqnvRIo.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10752,9648,36],"id":709790,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"Le Trésor sacré d'Hitler","overview":"","popularity":0.787,"poster_path":"/tweu6FBRSPjIYfVm1f1pzNUVYut.jpg","release_date":"2019-01-15","title":"Le Trésor sacré d'Hitler","video":true,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/ih30cG9OGlJ7zyzhG3G5Bd3YGa9.jpg","genre_ids":[12,18,36,53,10752],"id":5925,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Great Escape","overview":"The Nazis, exasperated at the number of escapes from their prison camps by a relatively small number of Allied prisoners, relocate them to a high-security 'escape-proof' camp to sit out the remainder of the war. Undaunted, the prisoners plan one of the most ambitious escape attempts of World War II. Eugene Smith: Photography Made Difficult","overview":"The war in the South Pacific, a country doctor in Colorado, victims of industrial pollution in a Japanese village — all were captured in unforgettable photographs by the legendary W. Eugene Smith. This program showcases over 600 of Smith’s stunning photographs and includes a dramatic recreation in which actor Peter Riegert (Crossing Delancey, Local Hero) portrays the artist using dialogue take from Smith’s diaries and letters. Interwoven through the program are archival footage and interviews with family and friends of this brilliant, complicated man, whose work developed from twin themes of common humanity and social responsibility.","popularity":4.906,"poster_path":"/gyrf9OZ4r3oO6MszpgpCBDjiqK.jpg","release_date":"1989-09-25","title":"W. Eugene Smith: Photography Made Difficult","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":550377,"original_language":"cs","original_title":"Zapomenuté transporty do Lotyšska","overview":"In January of 1942, two first transports with hundreds of Czech Jews leave Theresienstadt for the east. After a journey lasting several days, the trains reach the Latvian capital of Riga.","popularity":4.158,"poster_path":"/qg8xAHnOfVq1UhxvfAqBfyu1mMo.jpg","release_date":"2007-11-25","title":"Forgotten Transports to Latvia","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":550378,"original_language":"cs","original_title":"Zapomenuté transporty do Běloruska","overview":"Belarus between 1941 and 1944 was an apocalyptic place with nights lit by flames from hundreds of torched villages and with soil soaked in the blood of countless victims.","popularity":4.213,"poster_path":"/4jjsatTwPOwLeIk1uIN5i5hi3FO.jpg","release_date":"2008-03-18","title":"Forgotten Transports to Belarus","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[10752,99],"id":238008,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Death Mills","overview":"Originally made with a German soundtrack for screening in occupied Germany and Austria, this film was the first documentary to show what the Allies found when they liberated the Nazi extermination camps: the survivors, the conditions, and the evidence of mass murder. The film includes accounts of the economic aspects of the camps' operation, the interrogation of captured camp personnel, and the enforced visits of the inhabitants of neighboring towns, who, along with the rest of their compatriots, are blamed for complicity in the Nazi crimes - one of the few such condemnations in the Allied war records.","popularity":5.711,"poster_path":"/czNHDfe6Ix0iquEPn6R6P8ldZob.jpg","release_date":"1945-07-10","title":"Death Mills","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":11},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/6SEh1SjP2EZ6OAIfc8c9btpmcli.jpg","genre_ids":[28,36,10752],"id":9774,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Kokoda","overview":"A bitter battle is fought between Australian and Japanese soldiers along the Kokoda trail in New Guinea during World War II.","popularity":5.015,"poster_path":"/99XSpD5ItqGbwECfpspHWQRkwXR.jpg","release_date":"2006-04-25","title":"Kokoda","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":38},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/dHjb0duA8MwjiMJykF7dLcEoKBm.jpg","genre_ids":[18,36],"id":9045,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"Amen.","overview":"Kurt Gerstein—a member of the Institute for Hygiene of the Waffen-SS—is horrified by what he sees in the death camps. he is then shocked to learn that the process he used to purify water for his troops by using Zyklon-B, is now used to kill people in gas chambers.","popularity":41.638,"poster_path":"/3PEl3VbuMcZDMa1lUQGL4a7lMNI.jpg","release_date":"2002-02-27","title":"Amen.","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":330},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":705839,"original_language":"cs","original_title":"Tajemství podzemní továrny v Chebu","overview":"","popularity":1.138,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2012-04-22","title":"Tajemství podzemní továrny v Chebu","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/4e0D6uIj1csChiX944MGbFOM8Hv.jpg","genre_ids":[18,36],"id":551230,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Irgendwer","overview":"At the end of World War II, Red Army soldiers bent on brutal revenge for past atrocities attack a German city. Compassion comes from an unlikely source. Based on a true story.","popularity":2.113,"poster_path":"/1Np2HMTcv74S96vITvquOnLuTxL.jpg","release_date":"2017-10-03","title":"Someone","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/eYql3t9yUkcFbjP3nAIxp3bHxPL.jpg","genre_ids":[99,18,36,10752],"id":551291,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Scars Of Nanking","overview":"During the brutal invasion of China in 1937 by Imperial Japanese forces, tens of thousands of civilians and prisoners of war are murdered and women raped in what is known simply as \"The Rape of Nanking.\" This docudrama is a stirring account of a small band of courageous American missionaries who choose to stay in Nanking to try and protect a quarter million vulnerable Chinese civilians who are trapped in a city ruled by a savage, out of control army. Their stories are brought vividly to life through actual real-time letters and diaries as they bear witness to one of the worst wartime atrocities in history.","popularity":3.227,"poster_path":"/bDJSN6aFtmiqhVQY659sWEDBbA8.jpg","release_date":"2017-12-12","title":"Scars Of Nanking","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":1}],"total_pages":8968,"total_results":179341}
